thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Simon Kjaer flattered by rumours of Stamford Bridge move | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Simon Kjaer flattered by rumours of Stamford Bridge move | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer news: Simon Kjaer flattered by rumours of Stamford Bridge move | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 2:07 pm Simon Kjaer was flattered with the Chelsea rumours (Picture: Getty) 
Simon Kjaer has admitted that he was flattered following rumours linking him with a transfer to Chelsea . Paul Pogba shows brotherly love after Florentin is forced off injured 
The centre-back has made 35 league appearances for Fenerbahce since making his debut for the Turkish giants in 2015 but was heavily linked with a move to Stamford Bridge in January. 
Fenerbahce released a statement insisting Chelsea had not bid for Kjaer on January 11 but the Danish defender believes the speculation proves he’s doing the right things. 
‘There was nothing in it,’ the 27-year-old told Goal ahead of Fenerbahce’s Europa League clash with Krasnodar. Antonio Conte was linked with a move for Simon Kjaer (Picture: Getty) 
‘As a player, you have to close your eyes and ears for rumours, because there are always so many of them. 
‘Again, it is flattering to be mentioned in connection with other big clubs, and it confirms that I am doing things well.
